thread.title: Michael Swindler
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Michael Swindler

author: Michael Swindler
title: Michael Swindler
text: This was my second time using Disc Makers for a large DVD production and it was as good as the first. Very straightforward to use (love the templates and help pages), the product again came out excellent (love the shrink wrap - a nice professional-looking touch), and the prices are reasonable (love the bulk discount tiers). Will definitely use again and I highly recommend to others.
